ns1:MRWebServices__search.param3: SELECT mrASSIGNEES, COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN INSTR(mrASSIGNEES, ' ') = 0 THEN mrASSIGNEES ELSE SUBSTR(mrASSIGNEES, 0, INSTR(mrASSIGNEES, ' ') - 1) END AS mrASSIGNEES FROM MASTER1 WHERE {{FP_QUERY}} AND mrSTATUS='Closed') WHERE mrASSIGNEES IN
